name: @toast-ui/editor-plugin-dooray-auto-complete
description: TOAST UI Editor : Dooray! Auto Complete Plugin
author: NHN Cloud FE Development Lab <dl_javascript@nhn.com>

scripts.build:cdn: webpack build --env cdn & webpack build --env cdn minify
scripts.build:cdn-all: webpack build --env cdn all & webpack build --env cdn all minify
scripts.build: webpack build && npm run build:cdn && npm run build:cdn-all && npm run build:all
